stories.Title: First look at Apple's Vision Pro
stories.Description: The air was filled with skepticism and doubt leading up to Apple's big announcement, but the arrival of the Vision Pro headset has already surpassed expectations.
stories.Tweet: First look at Apple's Vision Pro 📦 The air was filled with skepticism and doubt leading up to Apple's big announcement, but the arrival of the Vision Pro headset has already surpassed expectations. #apple https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/05/first-impressions-yes-apple-vision-pro-works-and-yes-its-good/

stories.Title: Did Apple miss AI at their keynote?
stories.Description: Apple's WWDC 2023 unveiled several groundbreaking products, but "AI" was notably absent. Instead, they discreetly referred to it as "machine learning" and "ML."
stories.Tweet: Did Apple miss AI at their keynote? 📦 Apple's WWDC 2023 unveiled several groundbreaking products, but "AI" was notably absent. Instead, they discreetly referred to it as "machine learning" and "ML." #apple https://arstechnica.com/information-technology/2023/06/at-apples-wwdc-keynote-ai-never-came-up-by-name-but-it-was-there/

stories.Title: In case you missed it: WWDC 2023
stories.Description: Don't miss out on the latest from Apple! Discover the highlights from their Worldwide Developers Conference, including the highly anticipated Vision Pro headset and new iOS.
stories.Tweet: In case you missed it: WWDC 2023 📦 Don't miss out on the latest from Apple! Discover the highlights from their Worldwide Developers Conference, including the highly anticipated Vision Pro headset and new iOS. #apple https://www.fastcompany.com/90905189/everything-apple-introduced-wwdc-2023-vision-pro

stories.Title: Make the most out of GPT
stories.Description: OpenAI has provided a guide that outlines best practices for optimizing your outcomes, emphasizing experimentation as the key to discovering which methods work best for you.
stories.Tweet: Make the most out of GPT 📦 OpenAI has provided a guide that outlines best practices for optimizing your outcomes, emphasizing experimentation as the key to discovering which methods work best for you. #openai https://platform.openai.com/docs/guides/gpt-best-practices/strategy-give-gpts-time-to-think

stories.Title: Introducing: LlamaIndex
stories.Description: This open-source project allows developers to overcome limitations by enabling LLMs to work with personal and organizational data.
stories.Tweet: Introducing: LlamaIndex 📦 This open-source project allows developers to overcome limitations by enabling LLMs to work with personal and organizational data. #LLM https://techcrunch.com/2023/06/06/llamaindex-adds-private-data-to-large-language-models/

stories.Title: EU keeps fighting disinformation
stories.Description: The need to identify and label AI content has been stressed by commissioner Vera Jourova, urging signatories of the Code of Practice on Online Disinformation to take action.
stories.Tweet: EU keeps fighting disinformation 📦 The need to identify and label AI content has been stressed by commissioner Vera Jourova, urging signatories of the Code of Practice on Online Disinformation to take action. #ai https://www.techtimes.com/articles/292304/20230606/eu-urges-signatories-label-deepfakes-ai-generated-content-prevent-disinformation.htm

stories.Title: NASA’s Psyche is back on track
stories.Description: Although earlier setbacks hindered the Psyche mission, it has now resolved issues and is scheduled for launch in October 2023.
stories.Tweet: NASA’s Psyche is back on track 📦 Although earlier setbacks hindered the Psyche mission, it has now resolved issues and is scheduled for launch in October 2023. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/review-board-nasa-jpl-psyche-progress-outstanding-launch-on-track

stories.Title: Special delivery from SpaceX
stories.Description: The Dragon cargo capsule has reached its destination and is now docked at the International Space Station, unloading 7,000 pounds of supplies and scientific experiments.
stories.Tweet: Special delivery from SpaceX 📦 The Dragon cargo capsule has reached its destination and is now docked at the International Space Station, unloading 7,000 pounds of supplies and scientific experiments. #spacex https://www.space.com/spacex-dragon-crs-28-cargo-mission-docking

stories.Title: Acura and Google hit the road
stories.Description: Acura's upcoming electric SUV, the ZDX, harnesses Google's power through its built-in apps. Enjoy voice-activated controls with Google Assistant and navigate effortlessly with Maps.
stories.Tweet: Acura and Google hit the road 📦 Acura's upcoming electric SUV, the ZDX, harnesses Google's power through its built-in apps. Enjoy voice-activated controls with Google Assistant and navigate effortlessly with Maps. #EV https://electrek.co/2023/06/06/acura-first-ev-google-apps-built-in-optimize-routes-for-charging-zdx/

stories.Title: Equatic: Sustainability from the sea
stories.Description: This California-based startup is already backed up by Boeing for their innovative project that extracts carbon dioxide from the ocean and air while producing hydrogen as an alternative fuel.
stories.Tweet: Equatic: Sustainability from the sea 📦 This California-based startup is already backed up by Boeing for their innovative project that extracts carbon dioxide from the ocean and air while producing hydrogen as an alternative fuel. #startups https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/6/23749323/ocean-equatic-boeing-hydrogen-energy-carbon-capture

stories.Title: Fulfilling chipmaking promises
stories.Description: Intel aims for innovation in chipmaking with PowerVia, a new chip-building method that could lead to more efficient and powerful processors.
stories.Tweet: Fulfilling chipmaking promises 📦 Intel aims for innovation in chipmaking with PowerVia, a new chip-building method that could lead to more efficient and powerful processors. #intel https://www.theverge.com/2023/6/5/23748858/intel-powervia-new-chip-process-papers-vlsi-symposium-ready-for-manufacturing-testing

title: All eyes on Apple, EU fights AI disinformation, Psyche mission is on track
